#%%
H, W = 3, 5
S = ['.....', '.#.#.', '.....']



# i, j = 0, 0
# print('i =', i)
# print('j =', j)
# print('S[i][j] =', S[i][j])
# print('S[i][j-1] =', S[i][j-1])
# print('S[i][j+1] =', S[i][j+1])
# print('S[i-1][j] =', S[i-1][j])
# print('S[i-1][j-1] =', S[i-1][j-1])
# print('S[i-1][j+1] =', S[i-1][j+1])
# print('S[i+1][j] =', S[i+1][j])
# print('S[i+1][j-1] =', S[i+1][j-1])
# print('S[i+1][j+1] =', S[i+1][j+1])

for i in range(H):
    for j in range(W):
        if S[i][j] == '.':
            cnt = 0
            if j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i][j+1] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0 and j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0 and j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1 and j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1 and j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0
            S[i] = S[i][:j] + str(cnt) + S[i][j+1:]

print('\n'.join(S))

# hehe2
import sys

h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

grid = []
for i in range(h):
    grid.append(list(sys.stdin.readline().strip()))

for i in range(h):
    for j in range(w):
        if grid[i][j] == '.':
            count = 0
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j > 0 and grid[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and grid[i-1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j < w-1 and grid[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j > 0 and grid[i][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j < w-1 and grid[i][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j > 0 and grid[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and grid[i+1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j < w-1 and grid[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            grid[i][j] = str(count)

for i in range(h):
    print(''.join(grid[i]))


# test

import sys

h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

grid = []
for i in range(h):
    grid.append(list(sys.stdin.readline().strip()))

for i in range(h):
    for j in range(w):
        if grid[i][j] == '.':
            count = 0
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j > 0 and grid[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and grid[i-1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j < w-1 and grid[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j > 0 and grid[i][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j < w-1 and grid[i][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j > 0 and grid[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and grid[i+1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j < w-1 and grid[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            grid[i][j] = str(count)

for i in range(h):
    print(''.join(grid[i]))

from sys import stdin, stdout

h, w = map(int, stdin.readline().split())

grid = []
for i in range(h):
    grid.append(list(stdin.readline().strip()))

for i in range(h):
    for j in range(w):
        if grid[i][j] == '.':
            count = 0
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j > 0 and grid[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and grid[i-1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j < w-1 and grid[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j > 0 and grid[i][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j < w-1 and grid[i][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j > 0 and grid[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and grid[i+1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j < w-1 and grid[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            grid[i][j] = str(count)

for i in range(h):
    stdout.write(''.join(grid[i]) + '\n')

grid = []
for i in range(h):
    grid.append(list(sys.stdin.readline().strip()))

for i in range(h):
    for j in range(w):
        if grid[i][j] == '.':
            count = 0
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j > 0 and grid[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and grid[i-1][j] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i > 0 and j < w-1 and grid[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j > 0 and grid[i][j-1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if j < w-1 and grid[i][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j > 0 and grid[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0)

            count += (1 if i < h-1 and j < w-1 and grid[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0)
            grid[i][j] = str(count)

for i in range(h):
    print(''.join(grid[i]))

for i in range(H):
    for j in range(W):
        if S[i][j] == '.':
            cnt = 0
            if j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i][j+1] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0 and j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if i > 0 and j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i-1][j+1] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1 and j > 0:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j-1] == '#' else 0
            if i < H-1 and j < W-1:
                cnt += 1 if S[i+1][j+1] == '#' else 0
            S[i] = S[i][:j] + str(cnt) + S[i][j+1:]

print('\n'.join(S))
